message:
For those considering trying out the latest Visual Studio preview, and want to make sure they actually can (or how to work around it if it's too big):

Feel free to share it with anyone who may have similar concerns/questions.
name: Visual Studio 2013 Preview Space Requirement
description: In this video we check how much each part of Visual Studi 2013 Premium Edition takes on our disk after installation. We also check the bar minimum requiremen...

data.message: 12 GB is crazy, even 6 GB is way too much, what do they think it is an operating system
